# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Distribution / packaging
build/
dist/
*.egg-info/
*.egg
MANIFEST

# Unit test / coverage reports
htmlcov/
.tox/
.coverage
.coverage.*
.cache
nosetests.xml
coverage.xml
*.cover
.pytest_cache/

# Jupyter Notebook
.ipynb_checkpoints

# IDE configs
.vscode/
.idea/

# Data files (too large for git)
*.csv
*.xlsx
*.json

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Keep only your virtual environment folder
# Remove the venv folder from being ignored
# .venv/
# env/
# ENV/
# env.bak/
# venv.bak/
